patthana2.11:9.1: Upādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:9.2: diṭṭhupādānaṃ paṭicca kāmupādānaṃ, kāmupādānaṃ paṭicca diṭṭhupādānaṃ, sīlabbatupādānaṃ paṭicca kāmupādānaṃ, kāmupādānaṃ paṭicca sīlabbatupādānaṃ, attavādupādānaṃ paṭicca kāmupādānaṃ, kāmupādānaṃ paṭicca attavādupādānaṃ. #1
patthana2.11:10.1: Upādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:10.2: upādāne paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. #2
patthana2.11:11.1: Upādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāno ca noupādāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:11.2: diṭṭhupādānaṃ paṭicca kāmupādānaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, kāmupādānaṃ … pe ….
patthana2.11:12.1: Noupādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:12.2: noupādānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.11:12.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe noupādānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.11:12.10: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …
patthana2.11:12.12: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.11:13.1: Noupādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:14.1: Noupādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāno ca noupādāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:14.2: noupādānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā upādānā ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā upādānā ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. #3
patthana2.11:15.1: Upādānañca noupādānañca dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:15.2: diṭṭhupādānañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca kāmupādānaṃ.
patthana2.11:16.1: Upādānañca noupādānañca dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:16.2: noupādānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca upādānañca paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.11:16.6: upādānañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #2
patthana2.11:17.1: Upādānañca noupādānañca dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāno ca noupādāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:17.2: noupādānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca diṭṭhupādānañca paṭicca tayo khandhā kāmupādānañca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, dve khandhe ca … pe ….
patthana2.11:19.1: Upādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana2.11:22.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.11:26.1: Noupādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:26.2: ahetukaṃ noupādānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.11:26.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …
patthana2.11:26.10: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ;
patthana2.11:26.16: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.11:28.1: Upādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.11:29.1: Noupādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.11:29.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe noupādāne khandhe paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, khandhe paṭicca vatthu, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe ….
patthana2.11:30.1: Upādānañca noupādānaṃ ca dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.11:30.2: upādāne ca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, upādāne ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.11:33.1: Upādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāno dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.11:33.2: arūpe attavādupādānaṃ paṭicca kāmupādānaṃ, kāmupādānaṃ paṭicca attavādupādānaṃ. #1
patthana2.11:34.1: Upādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādāno dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.11:34.2: arūpe upādāne paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, upādāne paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
patthana2.11:37.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi … pe … naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.11:39.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava … pe … naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.11:41.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ (sabbattha ekaṃ), magge ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana2.11:47.1: Upādānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā upādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:48.1: Noupādānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā noupādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:48.2: noupādānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.11:48.10: (yāva ajjhattikā mahābhūtā) vatthuṃ paccayā noupādānā khandhā. #1
patthana2.11:49.1: Noupādānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā upādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:49.2: noupādāne khandhe paccayā upādānā, vatthuṃ paccayā upādānā. #2
patthana2.11:50.1: Noupādānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā upādāno ca noupādāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:50.2: noupādānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā upādānā ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.11:50.6: vatthuṃ paccayā upādānā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā upādānā sampayuttakā ca khandhā. #3
patthana2.11:51.1: Upādānañca noupādānañca dhammaṃ paccayā upādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:51.2: diṭṭhupādānañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paccayā kāmupādānaṃ, kāmupādānañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paccayā diṭṭhupādānaṃ (cakkaṃ kātabbaṃ).
patthana2.11:52.1: Upādānañca noupādānañca dhammaṃ paccayā noupādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:52.2: noupādānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca upādānañca paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.11:52.7: Upādāne ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, upādānañca vatthuñca paccayā noupādānā khandhā. #2
patthana2.11:53.1: Upādānañca noupādānañca dhammaṃ paccayā upādāno ca noupādāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:53.2: noupādānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca diṭṭhupādānañca paccayā tayo khandhā kāmupādānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe …
patthana2.11:53.5: Diṭṭhupādānañca vatthuñca paccayā kāmupādānaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā … pe ….
patthana2.11:55.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.11:57.1: Noupādānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā noupādāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:57.2: ahetukaṃ noupādānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā … pe …
patthana2.11:57.8: kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā noupādānā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.11:58.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi … pe … napurejāte nava … pe … nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava (paṭiccasadisaṃ) … pe … novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.11:61.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi nissayavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.11:65.1: Upādānaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho upādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:65.2: diṭṭhupādānaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ kāmupādānaṃ, kāmupādānaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ.
patthana2.11:66.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), vipāke ekaṃ … pe … vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.11:68.1: Noupādānaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho noupādāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:68.2: ahetukaṃ noupādānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.11:68.8: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe saṃsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.11:69.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte nava.
patthana2.11:72.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.11:77.1: Upādāno dhammo upādānassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.11:77.2: upādānā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ upādānānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.11:77.4: Upādānā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.11:77.6: Upādānā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ upādānānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.11:78.1: Noupādāno dhammo noupādānassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.11:78.2: noupādānā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.11:79.1: Noupādāno dhammo upādānassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.11:79.2: noupādānā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ upādānānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.11:79.4: Noupādānā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ upādānānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.11:80.1: Upādāno ca noupādāno ca dhammā upādānassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.11:80.2: upādānā ca noupādānā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ upādānānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.11:80.4: Upādānā ca noupādānā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.11:80.6: Upādānā ca noupādānā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ upādānānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.11:82.1: Upādāno dhammo upādānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.11:83.1: Noupādāno dhammo noupādānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.11:83.4: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana2.11:83.12: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ paccavekkhati, ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ … pe …
patthana2.11:83.15: nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.11:83.18: vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe … pe …
patthana2.11:83.22: vatthuṃ noupādāne khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.11:83.25: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.11:83.26: Cetopariyañāṇena noupādānacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa … pe …
patthana2.11:83.34: noupādānā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.11:84.1: Noupādāno dhammo upādānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.11:84.6: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana2.11:84.13: vatthuṃ noupādāne khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #2
patthana2.11:85.1: Noupādāno dhammo upādānassa ca noupādānassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.11:85.14: vatthuṃ noupādāne khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha upādānā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.11:86.1: Upādāno ca noupādāno ca dhammā upādānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.11:88.1: Upādāno dhammo upādānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.11:88.3: upādāne garuṃ katvā upādānā uppajjanti … tīṇi.
patthana2.11:89.1: Noupādāno dhammo noupādānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.11:89.10: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, assādeti abhinandati, ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti … pe …
patthana2.11:89.15: vatthuṃ noupādāne khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.11:89.17: noupādānādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.11:90.1: Noupādāno dhammo upādānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.11:90.8: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana2.11:90.15: vatthuṃ noupādāne khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.11:91.1: Noupādāno dhammo upādānassa ca noupādānassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.11:91.16: vatthuṃ noupādāne khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā upādānā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.11:91.18: noupādānādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ upādānānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.11:92.1: Upādāno ca noupādāno ca dhammā upādānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … ārammaṇādhipati … tīṇi.
patthana2.11:94.1: Upādāno dhammo upādānassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.11:94.2: purimā purimā upādānā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ upādānānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.11:94.4: Purimā purimā upādānā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ noupādānānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.11:94.7: Purimā purimā upādānā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ upādānānaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.11:95.1: Noupādāno dhammo noupādānassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.11:95.2: purimā purimā noupādānā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ noupādānānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.11:96.1: Noupādāno dhammo upādānassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.11:96.2: purimā purimā noupādānā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ upādānānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.11:97.1: Noupādāno dhammo upādānassa ca noupādānassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.11:97.2: purimā purimā noupādānā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ upādānānaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.11:97.3: āvajjanā upādānānaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3

patthana2.11:269.17: upādānavippayuttādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana2.11:270.9: vatthuṃ upādānavippayutte khandhe ca lobhañca garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #2

patthana2.11:272.3: diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagate khandhe ca lobhañca garuṃ katvā upādānasampayuttā khandhā uppajjanti.

patthana2.11:272.7: Diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagate khandhe ca lobhañca garuṃ katvā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.11:274.1: Upādānasampayutto dhammo upādānasampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.11:274.2: purimā purimā upādānasampayuttā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ upādānasampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.11:274.4: Purimā purimā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa diṭṭhigatavippayuttassa lobhassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.11:274.7: Purimā purimā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.11:275.1: Upādānavippayutto dhammo upādānavippayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.11:275.3: purimā purimā upādānavippayuttā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ upādānavippayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.11:275.9: Purimo purimo diṭṭhigatavippayutto lobho pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.11:275.12: Purimo purimo diṭṭhigatavippayutto lobho pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.11:275.13: āvajjanā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.11:276.1: Upādānasampayutto ca upādānavippayutto ca dhammā upādānasampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.11:276.2: purimā purimā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.11:276.4: Purimā purimā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca pacchimassa pacchimassa diṭṭhigatavippayuttassa lobhassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;

patthana2.11:369.1: (Ghaṭanā adhipati tīṇi, upādānadukasadisā. Sabbe paccayā upādānadukasadisā. Upādāniye lokuttaraṃ natthi, paccanīyampi itare dve gaṇanāpi upādānadukasadisaṃ.)
patthana2.11:376.1: Upādānañceva upādānasampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāno ceva upādānasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:377.1: Upādānañceva upādānasampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca upādānasampayutto ceva no ca upādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:378.1: Upādānañceva upādānasampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāno ceva upādānasampayutto ca upādānasampayutto ceva no ca upādāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.11:378.2: diṭṭhupādānaṃ paṭicca kāmupādānaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.11:380.1: Upādānasampayuttañceva no ca upādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe ….
patthana2.11:380.3: (Saṃkhittaṃ. Āmasanaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ upādānadukasadisaṃ nava pañhā. Rūpaṃ natthi. Evaṃ sabbepi vārā vitthāretabbā. Arūpaṃyeva.)

patthana2.11:385.2: upādānā ceva upādānasampayuttā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ upādānānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.11:389.4: Upādāne ārabbha upādānasampayuttā ceva no ca upādānā khandhā uppajjanti.

patthana2.11:392.1: Upādāno ceva upādānasampayutto ca dhammo upādānassa ceva upādānasampayuttassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. ()
patthana2.11:393.1: Upādānasampayutto ceva no ca upādāno dhammo upādānasampayuttassa ceva no ca upādānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.11:393.3: (Tīṇipi, tīsupi dvepi adhipati kātabbā, ghaṭanādhipatipi tīṇi.)
patthana2.11:395.1: Upādāno ceva upādānasampayutto ca dhammo upādānassa ceva upādānasampayuttassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.11:395.3: (Evaṃ navapi pañhā kātabbā, āvajjanāpi vuṭṭhānampi natthi.)

patthana2.11:417.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe ….
